features: Protects your baby from rain, cold, wind, and belongings
Perforated air vents for air circulation
Fits most standard double jogging strollers
body.description: Active families love being outdoorsThe Comfy Baby Double Jogging Stroller Rain Cover won't let moody weather ruin your fun. Double Jogging Stroller Rain Cover When jogging through cooler weather, there is no need to worry about giving the youngsters a chill. The Double Jogging Stroller Rain Cover protects from cold weather, wind, and even rain. During the autumn season, weather can be unpredictable, but having this weather shield available fighting off Mother Nature is easy! When the grey clouds start rolling in, the rain cover protects both children from getting drizzled on with waterproof, transparent vinyl. Not only will the double baby stroller cover protect the little ones, but also the belongings around the stroller such as: nappy bags, drinks and jackets. Comfy Baby knows not only how to protect, but also keeps maintenance a breeze with just a simple wipe of a cloth. The lightweight, vinyl material is easy to fold, carry and store away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly over our City Mini GT Double! Seems pretty durable and easy to fold. Will update how it does after 10 days in Disney!UPDATE: it held up great and was easy to use! So glad we had it for one of the craziest storms after a long day in the parks with two sleeping kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the Mountain Buggy DUO Perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: I have an older Mountain Buggy DUO (not the Duet, which is the more recent model) and this cover fit my stroller PERFECTLY! It's made of lightweight clear plastic which made it easy to wad up and store in the basket of the stroller. If the plastic had been a lot thicker I think it would have been bulkier to fold up and store so I'm pleased with how lightweight it is. I haven't been able to use my cover yet, but I'm looking forward to testing it out soon. I don't anticipate having any issues with it since it covers the frame of my stroller perfectly and fastens securely with velcro straps.When you compare this to the current prices on Mountain Buggy double stroller rain covers ($50-75), this is a steal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2010
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job for a great price
reviews.reviewText: Edited to add our stroller model. It was a Tike Tech double jogging stroller, but the old model that had 2 front wheels.Here's the original review:I'm in a situation where I (stupidly) didn't buy the rain cover for my stroller when I bought the stroller. I'm in Oregon, what was I thinking? Once I came to my senses and realized I needed one the stroller manufacturer had changed their models' styling and no longer have a double stroller with 2 wheels in front. I emailed them to ask if the new cover would fit my year-old stroller and got no reply. I really didn't want to spend $45-50 on a cover that might not fit, so I tried looking for a more generic cover. I'm so glad I did!This cover is so much cheaper and it does the job. No, it doesn't fit tightly, but it's vinyl and I'm glad fresh air is getting in there to my kids so I see that as a plus. My daughter sometimes hates having it over her shoes but the generically placed velcro means that I can still keep my son covered and dry while the 2yo gets a little rain on her hands. All in all I'm very thankful I tried the cheaper generic cover because I think her hissy fits would have meant I couldn't have used all the lock-down snaps on the more expensive custom cover, if it would have worked on our stroller at all.I would give the thing 5 stars if it wasn't for all the time I had to have it sit in our mud room off-gassing before I was willing to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the (old version) of the city mini double great!!
reviews.reviewText: Fits the (old version) of the city mini double great!! I think people who thought it didn’t fit put it on wrong, which may be easy to do if you put it on for the first time with the canopy closed. We are planning to use this for our upcoming Disney trip. If we have problems once we actually use it, I will try to update my review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2011
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars works okay, not best quality
reviews.reviewText: There are no instructions or diagrams that come with this to show you where all the velcro is supposed to attach, so it possible my husband and i simply cant figure it out, but if not then this cover does not even semi securely cover the stroller as I was made to believe. Also the quality wont be expected to last very long... part of one of the seams tore as I was opening the package. I bought this when I bought our double jogger, the Schwinn Turismo remote Swivel Jogging Stroller, and it doesnt fit quite right but we are keeping it because we dont have a garage and need to keep the stroller out of the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It fits my double bob great. But I haven't run with it yet. I'll maybe come back and give another review after my run.Update: After I took it for my run in the snow (41°F) It's pretty good but I need to find a way to tide it a little tighter. It was good overall with some adjustment here and there when running against the wind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT! Worth every cent, even if only lasts one Disney trip.
reviews.reviewText: Life saver at Disneyland in rainy January weather. Held up to full 5 days but showing wear by the end with heavy use. Better than anything else I came across, wel worth the money even if it only lasts one trip. We'll likely get 1 heavy duty Disney trip and several lighter trips out of it. We live in Arizona, so don't need often here.... mostly take with us when traveling to wetter environments. Used on 2016 city mini gt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2012
reviews.reviewText: I bought this rain cover for my Bob Revolution double jogger. It doesn't fit the Bob at all, don't even try. I say the product is awful, though, because it ripped as I was taking it out of the package. It ripped along one seam so I figured I would still try it thinking I could tape it or something. As I tried to get it over the stroller it ripped again in several more places. Granted, it doesn't fit the Bob, and that is why I would expect it to rip if I was trying to force it on to make it fit. But I was being extra careful since it ripped as I was taking it out of the package. I sent it back. Pay the extra money and get the cover made for your specific stroller. I learned my lesson trying to be cheap.

reviews.reviewTitle: covers the seats well but check your stroller handle
reviews.reviewText: it covers both seats well and is great in our cold climate. my double stroller handle isn't made to fit this plastic as there is a bar in the center, so the plastic cant go down and I cant secure it well on the top.

reviews.reviewTitle: A good fit on the stroller and grandkids love it
reviews.reviewText: A good fit on the stroller and grandkids love it, but the velcro tabs to secure it to the front of the stroller are not well attached and one popped off already.
Very disappointed! It doesn't fit my baby trend double jogging stroller at all! It was a waste of money!
